page.title: 07ELPHINSTONE SHOPS AND BUSES
page.content:
THERE ARE TWO SHOPS IN THE VILLAGE.THEY SELL EVERYTHING FROM SWEETS TO WASHING UP LIQUID.WHEN GORDON WAS INTERVIEWED HE SAID THAT HE OPENED AT 7.30AM. UNTIL 1.30 THEN FROM 2.30 'TIL 6.30PM.HIS SHOP IS ALSO THE LOCAL POST OFFICE. HE GOES TO A LOCAL CASH AND CARRY CALLED McNABS FOR HIS SUPPLIES. THE OTHER SHOP "JESSIES" OPENED AT 6.30 TILL 1.00 THEN FROM 3.00PM. TILL 6.00PM.IT SELLS PAPERS, FROM THE DAILY RECORD TO THE EVENING NEWS.
THE LOCAL BUS SERVICE IS THE EASTERN SCOTTISH WHICH PASSES THROUGH ELPHINSTONE EVERY TWO HOURS. THIS MAKES IT VERY DIFFICULT FOR THE VILLAGERS TO TRAVEL LOCALLY AS THE NEAREST TOWN, TRANENT, IS ONLY TWO MILES DISTANT.
